title: React+Webpack+Typescript: fine with react v15, but fails to resolve 'react-dom' with react v16
body:
tsconfig.json: ``` { "compilerOptions": { "jsx": "react", } } ``` webpack.config.js ``` module.exports = { entry: './app.tsx', output: { filename: 'bundle.js' }, module: { rules: [ { test: /\.tsx?$/, use: 'ts-loader' } ] } }; ``` app.tsx: ``` import * as React from 'react'; import * as ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; ReactDOM.render(
Hello
, document.getElementById('react-app') ); ``` With Reqct 15: ``` "dependencies": { "@types/react": "15.0.35", "@types/react-dom": "15.5.1", "@types/webpack-env": "1.13.3", "react": "15.6.1", "react-dom": "15.6.1", "ts-loader": "3.2.0", "typescript": "2.6.2", "webpack": "3.10.0" } ``` Everything is fine: ``` $ webpack Hash: a92fe528d11e00efc2c4 Version: webpack 3.10.0 Time: 2231ms Asset Size Chunks Chunk Names bundle.js 746 kB 0 [emitted] [big] main [81] ./app.tsx 206 bytes {0} [built] + 183 hidden modules ``` But with React 16: ``` "@types/react": "16.0.31", "@types/react-dom": "16.0.3", "react": "16.2.0", "react-dom": "16.2.0" ``` It fails to resolve 'react-dom': ``` $ webpack Hash: 9d276a350f7222e47059 Version: webpack 3.10.0 Time: 1991ms Asset Size Chunks Chunk Names bundle.js 70.4 kB 0 [emitted] main [6] ./app.tsx 206 bytes {0} [built] + 11 hidden modules ERROR in ./app.tsx Module not found: Error: Can't resolve 'react-dom' in '/home/dmitry/Projects/fails' @ ./app.tsx 4:15-35 ``` What is the cause for such behavior? ``` $ npm -v && node -v && cat /etc/debian_version 5.5.1 v9.3.0 9.3 ```
